subject: RE: [junit] How to check the value of one variable in one method in a class in  ajunit testcase..(variable is not returned)..
msgSnippet: ... Well, presumably you know Java, otherwise you wouldn t be using JUnit. What other ways can you think of to check the value of a variable without using a
messageBody:
> thanks for ur response...
> no i dont hav any getter methods,,,,
> i think if i include that i can test their values...
> is thr any possiblity to chk those variables without getter
> methods...?

Well, presumably you know Java, otherwise you wouldn't be using JUnit.
What other ways can you think of to check the value of a variable
without using a getter method?


Todd.
